title: CHAMPION SELECT ROLE TABS
body:
so i was thinking i sometimes have a bit of trouble selecting a champion in champ select when the one i'm familiar with are banned out (especially tanks) and i feel like this idea would help with team building as well as clarity in champ select. 
so we have the role display in our champion pool, you know the one that little tab where that shows every champ you on and you can filter them by roll and if you own them.

my idea is this add this function to champion select, my reasoning is this say a team needs a tank but a person isn't familiar with all the tanky champs they could just click the tab labeled tanks and BAM! there you go pick one. 

now natural assigning them by their traditional roles would be the easiest solution here but a cooler more interesting option would be to allow players to have 5 personal tabs in champ select personalized to them. so they can customize them how they see fit and fill them with the champs they are both familiar with and by role such as top, adc, etc. 

basically i think some sort of role select quick filter option would be nice considering LoL is reaching near 130 champions and is still expanding. 
having such a large champion pool can be quite daunting to go through when looking for a champion for a specific role especially if you aren't overly familiar with the role and you only have a small time frame to chose a champion like in ranked. 

this is just an idea and i know LoL has a champion search system but that also requires you to know what you are looking for. so that kinda doesn't help with the problem.

Any way this is just thought i have had for like 2 years now and i decided to share it.

replies.body:
You can. There are 6 roles that Riot have made searchable. "Assassin" "Fighter" "Support" "Mage" "Tank" "Marksman"

Granted you find champions like Blitzcrank listed under Tank/FIghter and not Support, so it's not perfect but can help newer players.

There is also a way to make Custom Lists using LSI (although I don't know if it's 100% "legal" to do so). But the fact that you can kinda means Riot could easily implement a custom list system.
i reckon it'd be pretty cool if they did implement a custom list system then it'd be awesome.

you can implement it yourself by keeping a word document or a notepad with
Championname|Championname

EG. Poppy|Renekton|Rengar

and just copy paste it into the search bar.
